inquiries.subject: Account verification issue
inquiries.content: I'm having trouble verifying my account. The verification email never arrived.

replies.author: Support Team
replies.content: We've resent the verification email. Please check your spam folder.

inquiries.subject: Payment processing problem
inquiries.content: My payment was charged but my subscription wasn't activated.

replies.author: Billing Team
replies.content: We're investigating this issue. Your subscription will be activated within 24 hours.

inquiries.subject: Feature request for coaching system
inquiries.content: It would be great to have a rating system for coaches.

replies.author: Product Team
replies.content: Thank you for the suggestion! We've added this to our roadmap.
